name: Thy Lethal Quest
description:
This was my first game and I'm... a kindly proud of it. Is a bit difficult to play, so I recommend to read the tutorial section. This is an exploration game with a little of space invaders-based battles. May sound weird, you'll have to play it to know. The music comes from the Neverwinter Nights 2 OST.

This game has some gross bugs, principally in the boss fights.
